caption.p: Characterizing the ultra-structure of starch granules in contrasting wheat cultivars under HS, (a) structure of starch granule in HD3086 under control condition, (b) structure of starch granule in HD3086 under HS-treated condition, (c) structure of starch granule in BT-Schomburgk under control condition, (b) structure of starch granule in BT-Schomburgk under HS-treated condition.
